message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500.  I think this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $9,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,000 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $9,250. This is a fair price, considering the value of the product to you and my bottom line. Let's reach a deal.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I am willing to consider $9,100 as a fair price for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
